1.16.5.0.1.0:
Licensed under NWTG Public License 1.0
Added a creative tab for the mod
Added textures for the blocks
Added the Auto Machine Block, Farming Machine, Auto Crafting Machine, Auto Item Collector Machine, Remote Item Teleporter
Added the Machine Wrench item
Added support for Bread, Sugar, and Pumpkin Pie recipes to the Auto Crafting Machine
Added support for Eggs collecting to the Auto Item Collector Machine
Added a crafting recipe for the Machine Wrench, Auto Farming Machine, Auto Crafting Machine, Auto Item Colector Machine Remote Item Teleporter, and Machine Block
Added a tags for both items and blocks for the Auto Farming Machine, Auto Crafting Machine, Auto Item Collector Machine, Remote Item Teleporter, and Machine Block
Added a inventory for the Auto Farming Machine, Auto Crafting Machine, and Auto Item Collector Machine
Added model for the Remote Item Teleporter
1.16.5.0.1.1:
Fixed some issues with the remote item teleporter
Fixed some issues with the Auto Crafting Machine
1.16.5.0.2.0:
Added Breaker Panel, Auto Tree Farm Machine, Grass Slab blocks
Added a password screen
Added more Auto Crafting Machine recipes
Added crafting recipes for Auto Tree Farm Machine, Breaker Panel, and Grass Slabs
Added Breaker Panel Support for all machines
Added more tags for cross mod support
Added Owner tag to all machines
Breaker Panels now use a ownership system
Crafting Recipes now have cross mod support
Its now possible to unlock recipes
Ownership is given to the player who places the machines and devices
Changes to the Remote Item Teleporter boundry box
Fixed some recipe rlated tag issues
Fixed type in tag name for lever
1.16.5.0.2.1:
Fixed Auto Farming Machine
Fixed a critcal issue from trying to link a breaker block to a remote item teleporter
